comments.author: differcookie+bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: 4.0

If I add this line to my userChrome.css:

menuitem[class="openintabs-menuitem"] { display: none !important; }

then I can't use my middle mouse wheel to scroll up in bookmark folders.
I can still scroll up in the main bookmarks menu.
I can scroll down in both folders and the main bookmarks menu.

Reproducible: Always
